name: Denial (itch) (aoyuna, milkimoone, Laourino, Sk8terboii)
description:
So many questions...
and all of them irrelevant.
You seem to have a bit of an identity crisis, it has been going on for a while, hasn't it?

By revisiting childhood memories and collecting mirror shards,
you can help Daniel find his true identity and repair his shattered self.
Discover a surreal realm created by Daniel's own imagination.

Controls

Move around with W, A, S & D
Press E to interact with object highlighted with an exclamation point
Use your mouse for singe interactive scenes

This game was created by

Noe – 3D-Models, Music, Scriptwriter, Additional Programming, Voice of Daniel
Julian – Programming, Voice of the Narrator
Annie – 3D-Models, Texturing, Shaders, Voice of the Therapist
Laura – Sound Effects and implementation
Dana – 3D-Models, Texturing, 2D-Art, Documentation, Voice of the Mother
